text: What I'm actually trying to do is create a custom work around for smart content -- Checking to see if they are a member of a smart list.

<@U25PYL3Q8|nickdeckerdevs> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/nickdeckerdevs/F2FPY0JF4/small_snippet_to_get_go_through_list_memberships_for_a_contact.html|small snippet to get go through list memberships for a contact> and commented: So I'm looping through the list memberships.  And because I have to loop through them I have to create a div if they are a member and then use JS later to filter the content
because of the variable scopes I'm having a hard time figuring out a more eloquent way of doing this...
